Translations.Text: Kaj diabl dir judgment issued DI promes vi truthful promes mi promes vi mi romp my promes! Mi ne hav potenc vi; mi simply invit vi vi akcept my invitation! Do ne blame me blame nur yourselves! My plend ne help vi nor can your plend help me Mi disbelieved your idolizing me transgressors incurred painful retribution
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili admitted gxarden flu streams Ili abide therein forever en accordance kun vol their Lord Their greeting therein est Pac
Vi ne seg DI Do cited ekzempl bon vort bon arb radik firmly fiks its brancx est alt en des cxiel
Gxi produkt its crop cxiu sezon as desegn its Lord DI TIEL cites EKZEMPL POPOL KE ILI PREN heed
Ekzempl mav vort est de mav arb chopped soil nivel; gxi ne hav radik keep gxi star
DI strengthens those KRED proven VORT en this life Hereafter Di send transgressors astray. Cxio est en accordance kun di testament
